      @Transactional public boolean createTentativeSchedule(UUID idWorker, TentativeScheduleDTO tentativeScheduleDTO) throws org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException, ClientInvalidDataException

      Specified by:
      createTentativeSchedule in interface TentativeScheduleService
      Parameters:
      idWorker - The ID of the worker.
      tentativeScheduleDTO - The tentative schedule data to create.
      Returns:
      true if the tentative schedule is created successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException - If there is a data integrity violation.
